verbs.description: [V: suspect] wearing scream mask strikes bank in hampton township police are searching for the person who wore a scream mask to rob the citizens bank in hampton township according to the hampton township police chief the citizens bank on route 8 was robbed around 12 30 p m by a person wearing a scream mask police say the suspect is 6 feet to 6 foot 2 inches tall wearing a blue hoodie black pants latex gloves and was carrying a black backpack at the time investigators say the robber never showed a police chief thomas vulakovich robbery pittsburgh hearst television hampton township pittsburgh field office calvary baptist church citizens bank fbi volakovich federal bureau of investigation
